PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SensorTypeIonConcentrationSensor
PropertySetDef.Definition: A device that senses or detects ion concentration such as water hardness. HISTORY: Added in IFC4.

PropertyDef.Name: SubstanceDetected
PropertyDef.Definition: Identification of the substance that is being detected according to chemical formula. For example, calcium carbonate is 'CaCO3'

PropertyDef.Name: SetPointIonConcentration
PropertyDef.Definition: The ion concentration value to be sensed. Use IfcPropertyBoundedValue.SetPointValue to set the set point value.
